text: Juan Luis Londoño Arias (born 28⁸ January 1994), known professionally as Maluma, is a Colombian singer. His best known singles are "Felices los 4", "Borró Cassette", and "Corazón". His single, "Chantaje", was a collaboration with Shakira and "Medellín" was with Madonna. Maluma has won a Latin Grammy Award, an MTV Video Music Award, two Latin American Music Awards, and been nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Latin Pop Album. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian singer- songwriters Category:Writers from Medellín Category:Singers from Medellín
title: Maluma
